<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
**{{nbt|byte|CanJoinRaid}}: 1 or 0 (true/false) - If false, the entity will not participate in raids and will not be counted in the progress bar.
**{{nbt|byte|PatrolLeader}}: 1 or 0 (true/false) - True if the current mob is the patrol leader.
**{{nbt|byte|Patrolling}}: 1 or 0 (true/false) - Makes the mob assume [[Patrol#Behavior|patrol behavior]].
**{{nbt|int array|patrol_target}}: The block location that the patrol moves toward. Requires Patrolling tag set to 1 to work and at least 2 patrol members. Is not preserved when removed.
**{{nbt|int|RaidId}}: Numeric ID of the raid that the mob currently belongs to.
**{{nbt|int|Wave}}: Raid wave that the mob spawned as part of.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
